issue.title: Laser scan timestamp does not make sense

content.raw:
Okay, I want to make sure I understand.

The message header time (debugged) will tell us the start of a 25ms sweep,
but there will be time jitter between sweeps due to GPU availability. The sweep itself will have no internal timing jitter.

An alternative interpretation is that an entire sweep happens at the same time, given by the message header, rather than taking 25 msec to sample along the sweep path.

Another interpretation is that the sweep takes some other amount of time (say 12.5msec, or some time determined by the GPU).

If you can clarify the timing of each sample point relative to the message header time, that would be very helpful.
